column1: [[File:Annie Lennox.jpg|thumb|''Annie Lennox'' won an Oscar for [[Into the West]]]]

column3: is a Scottish singer. She recorded "[[Into the West]]" for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''

column1: She also recorded the less known "[[Use Well the Days]]". This song was not used in the film
column2: but appears on a bonus DVD included with the "special edition" of the film's soundtrack CD.
Best Song Written for a Motion Picture
